title: How does our platform work?
subtitle: Learn the steps required to log in and fully use the RoomCtrl platform

goToLoginPage.title: Go to the login page
goToLoginPage.description: Open the RoomCtrl application and click the "Log in" button on the home page.

steps.stepOne: The button is located in the top-right corner
steps.stepTwo: You can also click "Log in" in the navigation menu

enterCredentials.title: Enter your details
enterCredentials.description: Enter your username or email address and password.

steps.stepThree: Do not save your password in the browser

loginFinish.title: Login successful!
loginFinish.description: You are now logged in and have access to the full application.

steps.stepOne: You will have access to room bookings

securityTips.title: Security tips
securityTips.tipOne: Always use a secure password (minimum 8 characters)
securityTips.tipTwo: Never share your login details with others
securityTips.tipThree: If you forget your password, contact the administrator

goToRegistrationPage.title: Go to registration
goToRegistrationPage.description: Click the "Sign up" link on the login page or the home page.

steps.stepOne: The link is located below the login form
steps.stepTwo: You can also find it in the page footer

fillRegistrationForm.title: Fill out the form
fillRegistrationForm.description: Enter your personal details and contact information.

steps.stepOne: First and last name should be real
steps.stepTwo: Email must be active and unique

setPassword.title: Set a password
setPassword.description: Create a strong password to keep your account secure.

ready.title: Done!
ready.description: Your account is active. You can now fully use the application.

steps.stepOne: Go to login using your new credentials
